item.title: K8s Journey 1
item.description: Iâ€™ve just started to learn Kubernetes concepts. Here are notes that I might want to look at them later on. Keep in mind that I do not assert these notes to be complete, exact, precise, or correct. Also, although I am not an expert or used k8s on a daily basis, I have some prior experience with k8s. If you see any mistakes, please reach out to me. Pods Even though the pods might contain multiple containers, all are running on a single worker node; so, it doesn’t work on multiple worker nodes.
